channel.title: Is there a better way to handle IP bans?
channel.description: I remember a while ago there was a tut to fix IP banning so if someone is IP banned them can't make a new account at all. Does anyone know how to do it / have the code or something? I'd really like to be able to get this. It's really annoying when you can't permaban someone.

item.title: Is there a better way to handle IP bans?
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

Why do you need handler for that?
Here is how…
Search for

if(checkbannedusers() == 5) { returnCode = 4; System.out.println(playerName+" failed to logon because they are banned."); appendToLR(playerName+" failed to logon because they are banned."); savefile = false; disconnected = true; }

Find your ipban code and replace it with this

if(checkbannedips() == 5) { destruct(); returnCode = 4; System.out.println(playerName+" failed to logon because their ip is banned."); appendToLR(playerName+" failed to logon because their ip is banned."); }

Read full topic
item.source: Is there a better way to handle IP bans?

item.title: Is there a better way to handle IP bans?

I remember a while ago there was a tut to fix IP banning so if someone is IP banned them can’t make a new account at all. Does anyone know how to do it / have the code or something? I’d really like to be able to get this. It’s really annoying when you can’t permaban someone.
